title: Merge Wpf and Silverlight to be one framework (that would be called silverlight??)
body: Merge both frameworks to use the same assemblies and controls and make a .net silverlight profile that would be a subset of .net client profile and used by partially trusted xaps.

comments.body: I think this idea can safely be declined so that people can get their votes back to use for other things.
becuase naming the merged framework after the part which is unanimously seen as dead is such a great idea.
